description: Episode of Series "Growing Up". Kerry is a fifteen year old girl who leaves home and lives with her boyfriend. She becomes pregnant and returns to her family. The film considers some of the effects that the pregnancy and the decision to keep the baby have on Kerry's relationship with her family and her boyfriend.
